page.title: 06RECREATION AND TOURISM
page.content: There are excellent facilities for both the resident and holiday maker. A large golf course near Fort Gilkicker has marvellous views across the Solent. Along the coast there is a Sailing and Angling Club, as well as facilities for the keen jogger,walkers and brave swimmers. Over the water on Southsea Common the tourist is well catered for, with a large Amusement Arcade which would delight both adult and child! It is a very popular attraction in the summer season and the snack bars and ice-cream kiosks do a marvellous trade. It is accessible by public transport and there are also car parking facilities along the Common at Southsea. Several large hotels on the edge ofthe Common cater for summer visitors.
